attributes.shortDescription: Hand-carved from pure Himalayan pink salt crystal. Creates a warm, ambient glow while releasing negative ions to purify the air. Perfect for meditation spaces, bedrooms, or any room needing calming energy. Includes wooden base and dimmer cord.
attributes.title: Authentic Himalayan Salt Lamp - Medium
attributes.description: Hand-carved salt crystal lamp with wooden base and dimmer cord for creating ambient lighting and air purification.
